compliant.section: We may need to transfer your Personal Information to other affiliates of NUVOTON and/or NTCJ or their authorized distributors to provide the SERVICE you require or any other services/ assistance.
compliant.legal provisions: Data transfers outside the EEA are permitted, but only to countries or organisations that provide an adequate level of data protection as the EU. This can be demonstrated through an adequacy decision by the European Commission, or appropriate safeguards such as standard contractual clauses.

compliant.section: We use third party service providers to help us to administer certain activities and services on our behalf, such as fulfilling sending emails and text messages, providing advertisements, analysing usage of our Websites, tracking effectiveness of our marketing campaigns, allowing users to connect to their social network and providing customer support services.
compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall use only processors providing sufficient guarantees to implement appropriate technical and organisational measures in such a manner that processing will meet the requirements of this Regulation and ensure the protection of the rights of the data subject.

non_compliant.section: We may need to transfer your Personal Information to other affiliates of NUVOTON and/or NTCJ or their authorized distributors to provide the SERVICE you require or any other services/ assistance.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not specify the legal basis for processing personal data for each purpose (e.g., consent, contract, legitimate interests). It also lacks transparency and clarity regarding the specific categories of personal data being transferred.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the legal basis for data transfers to affiliates and distributors, such as legitimate interests or contractual necessity. Clearly identify the specific categories of personal data being transferred and the purposes for the transfer. Provide information about the safeguards in place to protect personal data during the transfer, such as standard contractual clauses or binding corporate rules.

non_compliant.section: We use third party service providers to help us to administer certain activities and services on our behalf, such as fulfilling sending emails and text messages, providing advertisements, analysing usage of our Websites, tracking effectiveness of our marketing campaigns, allowing users to connect to their social network and providing customer support services.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy lacks specificity regarding the third-party service providers involved, the data shared with them, and the purposes of data processing. It also doesn't mention obtaining user consent for specific processing activities like marketing and tracking.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a list of third-party service providers or categories of providers. Specify the types of data shared with each provider and the purpose of sharing. Ensure transparency by clearly stating the legal basis for processing data through these providers, including obtaining consent where necessary, especially for marketing and tracking activities.
